text:
I had a problem in using Tomcat 3.2.3 (running as a service) with the MS 
IIS5.0 .I configured Tomcat and IIS as described in the Tomcat-IIS-How-To but 
it didn't work. I always got the error No. 404-File Not Found. Then I tried the 
Tomcat Version 3.2.2 with exactly the same configuration and it worked fine.
creator: praxis_6@gmx.net
